DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find safe effective dose combination cetuximab ( Erbitux ) Tarceva ( erlotinib ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Cetuximab Combination With Tarceva Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Measurable disease Life expectancy least 3 month Must least one prior chemotherapy contain platinum Known document brain metastasis Prior cetuximab therapy
